overview: Senatorial hopeful Robert Bullock is hot on the campaign trail. Foxy wife Nikki Knights treats him to a tasty role reversal. At Robert's office, nasty Valley Girl Shanna McCullough and manager Jerry Butler plot to get the women's vote. Glamourpuss Ona Zee promises $1 million if soap opera star Sharon Kane endorses Robert! Who cares if Sharon is a real lesbian or just plays one on TV? Shanna doesn't. She wants Robert on the desk! Ona's servants Joey Silvera and Alexa Parks act up. Nikki steams and dreams of hot soap superstar Sharon. Jerry is offered a cool $1 million to entertain Ona while her husband watches.
title: Babylon Pink 2
